q: Eric Schmidt has been Google's chief executive since July 2001, when he took over the role from Mr. Larry Page and ushered the company through a public offering. More recently, he has Mr. Larry Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. Google's other co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects and new products, the company said.
